name: Divider
desc: A thin horizontal line, with padding on either side.

fields.name: thickness
fields.desc: The thickness of the line drawn within the divider.

fields.name: indent
fields.desc: The amount of empty space to the leading edge of the divider.

fields.name: endIndent
fields.desc: The amount of empty space to the trailing edge of the divider.

fields.name: radius
fields.desc: The amount of radius for the border of the divider.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.Divider.color} The color to use when painting the line.
